properties.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 13 at 3:27AM CST until February 14 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Des Moines IA
properties.description:
...Bitter Cold Air into Friday Morning...

.An arctic airmass will remain in place across central Iowa into
Friday morning. The combination of very cold temperatures and the
wind will produce bitter cold wind chills.

* WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills
with values as low as 40 below zero. For the Wind Chill
Advisory, very cold wind chills expected with values as low as
30 below zero.

* WHERE...Portions of northern and central Iowa.

* WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until noon today. For the
Wind Chill Advisory, from 9 PM this evening to 10 AM Friday.

* IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause
frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
properties.instruction:
Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you
wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a
hat, and gloves.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM CST FRIDAY
